channel.title: tor on gpestana
channel.description: Recent content in tor on gpestana

item.title: Why everyone should be using Tor
item.description: It’s been interesting weeks for those who have been thinking about online privacy and data protection and what does it mean in today’s hyper connected society. Although this is a multi layered problem - personal data can be collected at different network layers and in multiple ways- one of the most effective ways to protect our personal data is to use the Tor network. When I tell friends and non so technical people that they should be accessing the web through technologies that are used to access the dark web, I’m often received surprised reactions, fear, confusion and even disgust.
